TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FieldAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: This attribute is present on properties to indicate that they reflect an underlying unmanaged global variable.
Docs.remarks: When this attribute is present on a property, it indicates that the property actually reflects an underlying unmanaged global variable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string symbolName) cil managed

Docs.param: The unmanaged symbol that this field represents.
Docs.summary: Creates a new FieldAttribute instance with the specific symbol to bind.
Docs.remarks: Used by Objective-C bindings to bind an unmanaged global variable as a static field.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string symbolName, string libraryName) cil managed

Docs.param: The unmanaged symbol that this field represents.
The library name to bind. Use "__Internal" for referencing symbols on libraries that are statically linked with your application.
Docs.summary: Creates a new FieldAttribute instance with the specific symbol to bind.
Docs.remarks: Used by Objective-C bindings to bind an unmanaged global variable as a static field.

Docs.summary: The library name where the global symbol is looked up from.
Docs.remarks: The special name "__Internal" means that the symbol is looked up on the current executable.

Docs.summary: The global symbol that this field represents.
